feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
